name: Paintball
desc: A paintball event held at throwball court in GJB.

name: Do the dew
desc: Are you daring? Always longed for a challenge? Well here's your chance to prove everyone else wrong (Round 2)

name: Movie quiz
desc: A game where contestants are asked questions related to movies. Movies can belong to both Bollywood and Hollywood.

name: Selfie of the day
desc: Take a selfie with as many number of people and show it to us to win exciting prizes.

name: Roll the dice and win a prize
desc: Try your luck at guessing the probability of what may be the outcome of the roll of a dice. Prizes guarenteed for every registered user.

name: Book cricket
desc: Always wanted to play cricket, but never got the chance tp get on the field and play? Don't worry, this techNIEks get the feel of what cricket really feels like.(Round 2)

name: Lagori
desc: Championship game and it follows standard lagori rules.

name: Intensity
desc: Its a laser shooting game where player shoots at the light indication on the goal. It has both single and multiplayer options.

name: Pirates smugglers
desc: Its a game specially designed to give gamers a awesome experience of being smugglers. They have to be smart, alert and quick in their decesions in order to break into the vault and rob off all the treasure.

name: Cricket quiz
desc: Cricket quiz, 3 rounds, 2 in a team.

name: Lovemeter
desc: It is a wire loop game with some modifications.
